Content.Text:
<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! <MYNAME>! Welcome! You came at the
perfect time.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Things have been really slow here today. As you
can see, there are hardly any customers.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Do you have a little time to sit and...chew the
fat, so to speak?
<PAGE>
I mean, we hardly ever have any opportunities to
kick back and catch up at this time of day.
Might as well seize the chance, you know?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Great! Have a seat over here.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome! Oh, hey! It's been a while.

Raeger! Hi! How are y--ooh! Look at you,
skipping work so you can hit on a girl! You
naughty, naughty boy...
<PAGE>
And after you turned me down every time I
invited you to spend the afternoon with me, too!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_L>I'm not really "skipping work." I'm being friendly
and talking with a customer right now, aren't I?

Oh, hi, Raeger! Thank you sooo much for that
recipe you taught me. My family loved it! ♪
<PAGE>
I knew I could count on you to help me out.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Really? That's great to hear. I'm just glad to be of
service!
See you later!

Everything was delicious, as always. Thanks!
Take care!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry to keep you waiting this whole time.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...What's that? You think I seemed overly friendly
with those other girls?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Well, they're nice people and -- more importantly
-- they're good customers. I've no reason not to
be nice to them.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...C'mon, <MYNAME>. Something is clearly
bothering you. You can tell me! What is it?
Wish you'd be that nice to me.
Nothing. Customer's always right!
You're real popular with the girls.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wha...?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Er... Sorry. I wasn't really expecting that fastball
and I, uh...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...W-wait, no, don't misunderstand me! I'm not
saying you're acting selfish or anything. Perish
the thought!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>I was just, uh...struck by how cute you are
when you're pouting...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You know, I just realized this, but I guess I'm the
kind of guy who's a big softie about romance. Or
maybe it's just you!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I dunno. I mean, everything you say and do now
seems way beyond cute to me...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Hey, um, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>C-can I kiss you...?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm sorry! I'm sorry! This was totally the wrong
time to ask! I'm sorry!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Uhhh...AHEM. A-anyway...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I think it's obvious by this point, but I'm
completely stuck on you. I don't have any
interest in other girls at all.
<PAGE>
You seemed kinda anxious, so I'm just...putting
that out there. This is the first time I've ever felt
this way toward someone. Toward anyone!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><FACE_LOVE>I've had girlfriends in the past, yeah, but I've
never loved any of them like I do you,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
And I don't think that's ever going to change. So
you can relax, okay? Relax, and stay with me.
You'll always be my number one!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Whew...saying that out loud is kinda
embarrassing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Heck, I'm even technically still on the clock right
now. Thank goodness there are no customers
around to hear me stumble over my words!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...Hey! No laughing! Maaaan...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So now that you know how it is, get ready. I'll
pay as much attention to you as you want,
whenever you want. Undivided! You got that?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...Um, <MYNAME>? That, uh, didn't sound all
that sincere. Are you just trying to placate me?
To spare my feelings?
<PAGE>
If there's something you want to say, just say it,
okay?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>We're a couple now, y'know. I'd feel a lot better
if you'd speak your mind to me, without holding
anything back.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Don't worry. It doesn't matter what you say, I'm
not going to suddenly start hating you or
anything. I promise!
I want more of your attention.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah. If you don't want to say anything, I won't
force you. But it kinda feels like you don't trust
me...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
And given how awkward things have gotten, I
don't think you'll be smiling for me anymore
today. Let's try this again some other time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Next time, I'll be sure to ask you over after I've
closed up, so that you don't wind up sitting
around bored again.
<PAGE>
See you later, <MYNAME>.

I think I was a little too stubborn. Maybe I
should have opened up to him more...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? Uh...not really. That wasn't that kind of
thing, y'know?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>First and foremost, I've got you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
...Wait, are you getting jealous?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aah, I see now! I mean, if you're not jealous,
then you're not, and that's fine too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But I kinda wish you were. I mean, every guy
likes to have someone get jealous over him once
in a while...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Ah, well. I'll just think of it as you having too
much trust in me to let jealousy take you over.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Wow, more customers! Looks like today's going
to be a grind.
<PAGE>
I was hoping I could use some free time to chat
with you, but I don't know if I'll have enough of
it to give you the attention you deserve.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Guess it's about time to get back to work. Stop
on by next time you have a moment to spare,
okay? On my break, preferably!
<PAGE>
I hate to send you off like this, since we're a
couple and all, but I really do need to get to
work.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
See you later, <MYNAME>!
